name: Invesco Dynamic Building & Construction ETF
description: The Invesco Dynamic Building & Construction ETF (PKB) is designed to track the performance of the Dynamic Building & Construction Intellidex Index. This index consists of companies that are involved in various segments of the building and construction industry, including construction, engineering, and materials. The ETF aims to provide investors with exposure to the performance of the building and construction sector, which is influenced by factors such as economic growth, infrastructure spending, and housing demand. PKB offers a diversified portfolio of equities from companies involved in residential, commercial, and industrial construction, as well as manufacturers of building materials and related producers. By employing a rules-based methodology, the fund selects stocks based on various fundamental and technical factors, allowing it to potentially outperform traditional market capitalization-weighted indices. The Invesco Dynamic Building & Construction ETF is suitable for investors looking to capitalize on growth opportunities in the construction sector while maintaining diversification.
